entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
